Method Detail

toXML

public static java.lang.String toXML(java.lang.String aFilePath)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
Creates a string of XML that describes the supplied file or directory (and, possibly, all its subdirectories). Includes absolute path, last modified time, read/write permissions, etc. By default, it only descends one directory.

Parameters:
aFilePath - A file system path to be turned into as XML
Returns:
Am XML string representation of the file structure
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the supplied file or directory can not be found
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - If the default XML parser for the JRE isn't configured correctly

toXML

public static java.lang.String toXML(java.lang.String aFilePath,
                                     java.lang.String aPattern)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
Creates a string of XML that describes the supplied file or directory (and all its subdirectories). Includes absolute path, last modified time, read/write permissions, etc.

Parameters:
aFilePath - The file's or directory's structure to be returned as XML
aPattern - A regular expression that file names must match
Returns:
A string of XML describing the supplied file system path's structure
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the supplied file or directory can not be found
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - If the default XML parser for the JRE isn't configured correctly
